title: From Sicily::2251 - String class::1005::9.9 Sorting characters in a string
description:
# 9.9 Sorting characters in a string # Description

Write a function that returns a sorted string using the following header:

string sort(string &s)

For example, the following code output: abc

string s1("bca"), s2;

s2 = sort(s1);

cout << s2 << endl;

# Input # Output # Sample_Input ``` ``` # Sample_Ouput ``` ``` # Hint

只提交string sort(string &s)函数实现，不要提交main()函数。
